duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain the overall operation of the maintenance department and the appearance and working order of the hotel.
Review contracts, negotiate revisions, changes, and additions to contractual agreements with vendors, consultants, clients, suppliers, and subcontractors.
Develop and implement quality control programs and conduct monthly safety inspections.
Plan, organize, and direct activities concerned with the maintenance of structures, facilities, and systems.
Inspect and review projects to monitor compliance with building and safety codes, and other regulations.
Coach and counsel employees to reflect Hyatt service standards and procedures.
